review_body: A great product and works perfectly.  I love that the dryer is off the bathroom counter.  The mounting directions were a little confusing, though.  And the back plate was a little tough to get off.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This dryer does a good job and wasn't too expensive. It has several different settings available.  I am pleased with this purchase.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body:
After our old dryer bit the dust, I wanted to replace it with one that worked just as well, but also quieter, lighter, and had more features. From reading the specs and reviews on this Andis 82005 dryer, I felt this one fit the bill. But after using it for a week, I have mixed feelings. Here is why:

PROS:
1. Sleek looking (so what? Nice, but doesn't make your hair look any nicer)
2. Nice variety of attachments that stay attached nicely!
3. Long 10 ft. cord (if you need that, however I don't, and it really only gets in the way)
4. Hang loop
5. Dries hair fairly quickly (with Ion technology)
6. Outside stays cool to touch

CONS:
1. Heavier than the last two dryers we've had (Hot Tools Tourmaline Lite 1043 --- see my review on that one, and CHI low-EMF dryer).
2. Dries hair no faster than the two abovementioned ionic dryers
3. NOT quiet (in fact, louder than the two abovementioned dryers!)
4. Not enough speed/heat settings. Not much difference in heat settings, although speed settings are adequate.
5. Comb attachment actually hurts your scalp! Feels very scratchy, due to squared ends of the teeth.
6. Shiny silver-colored exterior shows prints, etc. much more than others.

All in all, not a bad dryer... I guess I expected more. But I would probably go with another one next time.

product_title: t3 featherweight hair dryer tourmaline ionic bespoke labs 83808
review_body: Will always buy T3 Hairdryers from now on... best investment. This hairdryer is amazing... and now cheaper since it's not the most current version. I can't imagine a better hairdryer. Dries my hair super fast, and the dryer itself is super light!

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I had been using an awful 8 year old, non-ionized dryer until I purchased this one... and I cannot say enough good about this product.  The temperature and output controls are fantastic;  it was definitely worth the money.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: I bought this for my mom and little sister's home, as one of their Christmas gifts this year, because they haven't had a blowdryer in the house for years now. They said they love it, it's a simple blowdryer with a high heat so it dries the hair fast; overall it's easy to use but doesn't come with any special perks. But guaranteed if you don't have one now it's better than what you have!

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_body: This hairdryer is the lightest and quietest I've ever used.  In fact, my husband now wants one of his own!

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body:
We picked a wall mount because she was always leaving her hair dryer plugged in, right next to the sink (that's a terrible accident just waiting to happen). After trying unsuccessfully to get her to unplug it and put it away, I realized her life would be a whole lot easier if I just got her a wall mount hair dryer and deliberately mount it next to where she stands in front of the sink rather than mount it right next to the sink itself. That solves a lot of problems: she doesn't have to use up drawer space for the dryer, I don't have to worry about her putting it away hot, it is always plugged in and ready, the coil cord never drags over the sink (so nothing getting knocked off the sink), and of course the risk of the dryer falling into the sink is practically eliminated.

This hair dryer is conveniently small so it's easy to handle, even for a young teen with long hair. It dries hair quickly because it is powerful despite its size.

Wall mounting was trivially simple -- it took less than five minutes with my hand dandy drill/driver, bits, level, and a hand screwdriver (it is much better to use a manual screwdriver instead of a drill/driver to screw into wall anchors). It comes with a wall template with a leveling line which makes the job go especially quickly.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Used only twice before it died
review_body:
This was a piece of crap. I used it once where the air flow was so weak I figured I'd have better luck drying my hair if my friend blew on it. The 2nd time I attempted to use it, it sparked and died. I left it in a trash can in Paris.

DO NOT BUY!!!!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: Do you like medium heat? Then Pass
review_body:
There are many reviews for this dryer, and in a nut shell, it works very well and does the job. I have two small complaints, but one of them is a big deal for me. I have medium textured straight hair that is very, very long. I like to use the medium heat setting for blow drying my hair for less damage but this dryers medium heat, is almost room temperature. It's not quite hot enough and therefore takes about 50% longer than my old dryer to get the job done.

Pros:
-nice feel in the hand
-nice frizz/flyaway control
-Low and high air flow
-3 temp. settings
-comes with diffuser

Cons:
-Medium heat is too cool causing long drying time
-the precision diffuser knocks off the dryer fairly easily with an accidental tap of the brush, or wrapping of the chord

I don't think I'd buy the same one again, but really, it's just a hair dryer!

product_title: elevate by andis 80405 professional lightweight tourmaline ceramic ionic 1875 watts hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer is amazing.  Just like the one they use in my salon, and it costs so much less!  This is my second one as I loved my first one so much, when it died I bought the same thing!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
I've had this hair dryer for 9 months and use it daily, but now am ready to give up on it and try a different brand. In the beginning, it worked pretty good, but it didn't take long for things to stop working correctly. Today was the final straw; after blow drying my hair this morning, it smells burnt. I'm getting rid of this thing before it starts a fire!

PROS
*Comes with lots of accessories
*Dries hair quickly
*Back opens so that dust filter can be cleaned

CONS
*Cool button stopped working after a few months
*LOUD
*Risk of fire/burnt hair
*Did not last long

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: I bought this blow dryer because my friend had one and loved it. Well, I love mine too! This dryer will dry your hair quickly without causing damage. It also reduces frizz really well, especially when used with a round brush. They sell this exact same hair dryer at the salon where I get my hair cut... at three times the price!!! I would highly recommend! This is a great deal.

product_title: pro beauty tools professional turbo hair dryer
review_body: I bought this blow dryer for my daughter. Funny enough, the only thing I can comment on is because I've only seen her use it to dry off her cat when she gave it a bath. I'm not saying  she hasn't used it herself. I just haven't heard anything from her about it?

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Not as powerful as I had hoped and the filter keeps falling off the back.  Otherwise, works okay.  Retractable cord is nice.

product_title: conair 1875-watt ionic conditioning pro style hair dryer
review_body: Conair has established their product quality so I cant coment much on the machine its self.  I got it at a great price and so I give it 4 stars (Very Respectable) So far it still works.  Not too much I can say to help you with your decision.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: Easy to install, nice nightlight.  Don't use the template.  Remove and Use the plate to determine the location for screw holes.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This blow dryer is awesome! Beautiful. The body of the dryer is nice a soft. Nice material used on it. And this dryer works very well. It's just so sleek and fun to use. I would give it 10 stars if I could.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: I have this same model...but a much older version.  I've probably had it for at least 8 years.  I never had any problems with it until the last year or so.  The button to retract the cord broke within this last year.  But the dryer continued to work.  Lately, it has started to get hot while using it and if I turn it off it won't turn back on until it cools down.  My husband says it's because it has a lot of dust in it.  He could take it apart and clean it out and it would probably last for several more years, but I miss the retractable cord.  I am looking for a new hair dryer and will very possibly get this same model.  I think I paid less than $20 for it.  You can't beat that for value in a hair dryer that lasted so long.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I bought this hair dryer for my girlfriend. She has long thick hair and gets tired of all the maintenance it takes. She has been very happy with this product. It works quickly and doesn't damage her hair.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This is a very nice hair dryer. The fan blows very strong, the heat is good, and the item is solid.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: Next best thing to being at the hair salon.  Have not had a chance to use much, but worked great the 2 times I used..

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_body: Great way to save counter space, well constucted hair dryer, high speed is fast and hot, makes for a quick dry.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: Light, compact and dries my hair really fast. That's exactly what I needed for day to day use and for travel.

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: It is compact size but not small enough for travel. But I use it in my room which is ok for me. It is powerful and can dry my short hair in a few minutes.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body:
I was looking for an Ionic drier because of how quick it manages my medium length hair. I wasn't worried about compact or travel.

It feels heavy enough to be quality, but not too heavy to use. The settings are good, although I expected a little more power from the high blower setting - but with the ionic tech it doesn't need to blow harder.

The cool blast button doesn't react as quickly as turning the heat setting to low.

For function, it's perfectly fine, no complaints with function.

The only thing I don't like which is a "feature", is the soft matte finish. It's pretty when it's new, but it gets scuffed and smudged with styling products and isn't pretty. I'm not one to clean my styling appliances so often but this one needs a wipe down more often than not. It's not terrible, but I don't like it, and it wasn't an issue with my former drier.

There are so many products out there which are comparable, it's really hard to decide. I'm not 'super excited', but I'm happy.

product_title: andis 80345 styler hair dryer
review_body:
Two words: noisy and dangerous!
It is not necessary to explain noisy...
Dangerous because the inner part is definitely not well protected.
Besides that, it takes too long to dry a hair that should had being completely dried in 5 minutes.
I send my back.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: This was a gift for my sister, and it was a great buy for the price. A very well made hair dryer.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: Love it.  It really works really well and is compact and light..It heats ups fast and gets the job done.Thanks

product_title: hands free hair dryer holder - compact for home and travel! by jumbl
review_body: This little gadget does exactly what it was made for, hold my dryer.  I had an inferior one before that was always falling, usually in the middle of the night, waking us.  As I am disabled, I need my rest & I need something to hold my dryer.  This works so well, I got one for my mother, too.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This is an item that my girlfriend requested on her wishlist, and i got it for her. She loves it, and apparently it is amazing. I am bald now, so I have no need for such things, but it's nice to know I bought her something that is great at drying the hair one might have.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Our old Conair started making noises about a month ago so we bought this thinking we would need it some morning.  The old one is still running, with a little noise, but it is the earlier version of this one and we have been happy with it.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: When it comes out of the box and I first start using it, the air is powerful but definitely not hot enough.  So the more I have used it over some months of time the hotter it has gotten, which I really like.  But the last few weeks I have noticed some sparking.  Freaks me out a bit!  I have been buying this brand for a while and my previous ones just shut down after about a year but this ones sparks.  Time to buy another blow dryer I guess.  Sparking from an appliance is never good.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I already have one of thise, but because I travel a lot, I have one at home and one for my travel trailer. Lots of heat & power in a small little dryer.

product_title: conair pro styler ionic conditioning hair dryer
review_body:
Man, let me tell ya, this thing really blows; and I mean that in a good way.
Buy one, it will blow you away..lol

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: Really love it. Have been using it for two months and it works great. The price is awesome, $7.79 with free shipping using Prime. Light weight, quiet sound and fast speed to dry my hair. Can't find any problem with it. Highly recommend.

product_title: conair 1875-watt ionic conditioning pro style hair dryer
review_body: I got this during the Black Friday madness and LOVE it! It has all the tips and ends anyone would need. Great buy!

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Just only use about one and half month, when I was using it and the Dryer stopped working suddenly. it's some part of inside the dryer was broken I guess and I really want to return this item！I was very angry about the quality of this dryer!

product_title: extracompact twinturbo 3500 2000 watt compact professional hair dryer
review_body: i like it  ,work very good,i will recommend it yo my friends,I'm sure they will love it like me+  good price.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Is a shame that we have 240 Volt in Australia and I had to buy a stepdown transformer wich made it more expansive.

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_headline: Third one I've owned - great and clutter free!
review_body: This is a great product. It is really simple to hang, works well, and keeps the countertops clutter-free. We have been so happy with it, we've purchased the Sunbeam one each time... years in-between - it lasts well.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: product of very good quality, impeccable wine .. recommend the truth .. I hope to continue buying ... 100% original product ..

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body:
I read several good reviews on this product and purchased it immediately.
It works great. My wife is very satisfied with this hair dryer.
I am considering buying a second one for my daughter.

product_title: conair 1875 watt ionic ceramic folding handle hair dryer
review_body: I have thick hair and it is really hard to get my hair dries in under 30 min but this hair dryer does it everytime. love the fact that the handle folds to save space and as its been dropped  a few times i know it is well put together and sturdy i would recommend tis product.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Love it! Just wish it lasted longer.
review_body:
Pros: doesn't over-dry hair to a crisp. Love the settings and switch options and easy one-handed access when changing modes. My two hair-stylists bought one because they liked mine so much and the great price.

Cons: My first model broke after 14 months. I only use it 3-4 times a week. The heating element died. My husband is a electrical engineer and took it apart and couldn't fix it. It feels like a waste to throw such a nice blow dryer away, but I liked it enough to by another one of the same model. Just hope it lasts longer.

product_title: hot tools ionic anti-static professional dryer - model # 1035 - black/purple hair dryer for unisex
review_headline: Everything a hair dryer should  be!
review_body: Fast, doesn't burn, doesn't weaken over time. Love it! My grandmother is a professional hair dresser and she recommended this for personal, at-home use due to a good blend of price and quality.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I tried it once and it came on with full power and then about 2 minutes in, the drying power was cut in half. There was nothing I could do to get it to come back on with full power. The highest setting was now merely a trickle of air. No idea what happened, but not going to buy it again.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: This blow dryer is ok.  First of all, it's a little larger than I thought & a little louder than my Conair 1875 watt dryer.  I prefer the Conair but kept this as a spare.

product_title: t3 bespoke labs 83808-se featherweight professional ionic ceramic tourmaline hair dryer
review_body: Extremely lightweight yet dries hair in record time, leaving it with a wonderful shine.  Also much quieter than my previous blowdryer, which is an added bonus.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Great hair dryer but won't last long
review_body: This hair dryer is great: it's quiet, powerful, and has all of the functions I need. That said, I've purchased it 3 times in the last 5 years. It will not last long (6 mon. to 12 mon. maybe). This last one I bought has been the shortest lived and it is dying slowly. Unfortunately, I'm going to have to look for a more expensive model that will hopefully last longer than this one.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_headline: Heavy and handle a little too fat for my preference
review_body:
This hair dryer works just fine but it was not as compact as I expected it to be.

It seems that with the ability for the cord to retract, they had to make the handle part fatter. For someone with smaller hands, it's a bit more effort to hold the dryer up. And on top of that, the dryer is pretty heavy which makes it even harder to hold it up straight for an extended time.

If you are smaller built and want things small and light, then this may not be the dryer for you.

product_title: hello kitty 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: When my granddaughter first used it she said it was broke!  Doing better using it now since we taught her not to hold so close to her head!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I received this as a gift and love it!  I have naturally curly hair and live in an area of high humidity.  This dryer dries my hair and leaves it smooth rather than fly away.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Not the best dryer I've ever had. It works, but it seems to take a long time to dry my hair, which is wavy, thick and coarse. I end up straightening my hair, anyway, so now I just wash it and sleep on it wet and straighten in the morning. I don't bother with the blow dryer.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: Dryer is tiny and comes with a travel bag including 2 attachments; the handle does not fold. It's a real nice product overall.

product_title: pibbs ttec8012 twin turbo 3800 professional ionic and ceramic hair dryer, black, 2100 watt
review_body: it was awesome!! i love the blow dry its amazing!! very happy with it!!! yayyyyyyyyyy my hair is ffaaaabbbuulloooouusss!! im like a professional hairdresser with this tool!!

product_title: conair 1875-watt ionic conditioning pro style hair dryer
review_body: My last hairdryer was really loud so although I expected this one to be more quiet than it is, it is still not as loud as my last one. It has the same power as my last one but really seems to dry faster. I love it! It works great and I would give it 5 stars if it was quieter.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: I bought this because my boyfriend didn't have one and I'm not used to air drying my hair when I shower at his place. He also needed one to dry off his dogs after washing them. I did my research and this one had great reviews and was the cheapest. I thought the item would be bigger but to my surprise it was a portable size so that was even better! The low setting is too low for me and drying my hair on the high setting was perfect. It even has a removable cap on the back for you to clean. For the price I paid, it definitely does its job and dried my hair quick! I would highly recommend this product to anyone!

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body:
My wife had one of these for years and it finaly quit
Bought this one and She loves it. She loves it I Love it

product_title: hot tools professional 800 watt ionic soft bonnet hair dryer, black & white
review_body: got this for my mom, her old hair dryer stopped. she loves this one. and when it is on hot, it is hot

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Saw one in Vegas hotel, had to have one.  Retractable cord is awesome if you're one to store dryer after each use.

product_title: turbo power twin turbo 2600 professional hair dryer
review_body: My sister in law is hairdresser and bought me one for my 35th bday. After 10 years of using it every day it finally quit. I have very long and thick hair and this is the best hair dryer since it dries my hair quickly. I went online to Amazon to buy a new one and am thrilled. Would never go back to cheap dryer that hardly works again. You have to go Turbo!! You'll be very happy you did.

product_title: t3 bespoke featherweight tourmaline professional ionic ceramic hair dryer model 83808-se
review_headline: T3 BESPOKE THE BEST BLOW DRYER
review_body: THIS BLOW DRYER IS THE ABSOLUTE BEST I HAVE EVER OWNED!!!  MY NIECE ASKED FOR ONE AS A CHRISTMAS GIFT AFTER USING MINE.  THERE SIMPLY IS NO BETTER BLOW DRYER OUT THERE, AND I HAVE TRIED THEM ALL!!!

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I love it because it retracts and folds. Its not that heavy that you can bring it with you when you travel. My hair dries quickly. I gave a 4 stars because the dryer is not that hot.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_body: High heat setting is practically automatic (don't have to wait for it to heat up).  And the blower on the high setting is very powerful.  This unit is even better than the ones we've used at hotels.  Highly recommend.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body:
This dryer was really heavy.
It hurts my arm when I drying my long hair.
So I am using with dryer stand.
The strength is good and sometimes it sparks.
Cheap and cute. That's it!!

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: My daughter had used this dryer in a hotel while traveling for work & she loved it.  It was at the top of her Christmas wish list, so it was one of the most appreciated gifts she received.  She assures me it is the best dryer she has ever used.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: I bought two of these for ourrental beach cottage so renters wouldn't have to use up space.  I just bought a third one.  I've used it myself while staying at the beach cottage and it's great!!

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Great Features, but is it durable?
review_body: On my second try here.  Features and performance is great, but first one failed after short time.  If this one doesn't last longer, there won't be a third.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This definitely cuts down your drying time and it leaves your hair soft & friz free. The only thing I would change is making the prongs on the diffuser longer to work better.  Other than that,  it's perfect.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: the product is great but it looked like it was just thrown in the box for mailing.  No registration information and no product information was included.  Maybe shouln't have ordered it around Xmas time.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: I selected this modeal as I had a previous model of this same hair dryer that finally failed after a few years of good service.  I purchsed the model 134R and it fit on the previous model's base plate, so I did not have to re-mount to the wall.  The light is now a LED version, which saves power but but puts out much less light than the older model- so it is not really suitable as a night light for the bathroom as the older model was (otherwise I would have given 5 stars).  The dual dryer settings are useful and the high setting is quite powerful- plenty for ay hair type in my opinoin. It is a noisy unit and can get quite warm, but performs as I expected. Overall, a good value for the money.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: Great, convenient product. My husband had one and it lasted for years. He looked all over for another one, and was really happy to find this one that would fit in his small bathroom.

product_title: hot tools ionic anti-static professional dryer - model # 1035 - black/purple hair dryer for unisex
review_body: I bought this dryer after using my mom's similar dryer and reading the reviews for this one. I totally love it. I have very thick long hair and it took close to an hour to fully blow dry my hair with my old conair dryer. This one dried my hair in literally about 5 minutes. It is also very light. I wish it was a tax quieter but overall I am more than pleased with my purchase.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_headline: Two years and blew up in my face
review_body: This hair dryer gets HOT. I love the controls - separate for temp and power. I love the removable filter. I've had it for about 2 years and used it on the hottest setting daily. I haven't had any more hair breakage than the next person, several stylists have complemented me over the years on the health of my hair. HOWEVER, like these other ladies, my hair dryer just blew up in my face as I was using it. Sparks flew out where the cord meets the handle, & it's dead. Every hair dryer I've ever had dies like this eventually - looking for one as good as this that won't blow up or catch fire though.

product_title: hot tools professional 1061 hard hat 1200 watt salon hair dryer
review_body: I received this hair dryer in December of 2012, tried to use it in January of 2013, lifted the hood and a piece snapped off. Now my hair dryer hood does not stay in place. I cannot use this item and do not recommend it because it is not durable.

product_title: hot tools professional 1061 hard hat 1200 watt salon hair dryer
review_body: Really good, and I like the adjustable features of the dryer. I'm pleased overall. I'd buy if I were you.

product_title: remington d-2012 tstudio collection tourmaline and ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I gave this to my sister as a birthday gift along with the hair straighter this worked great for  her until it just stoped working out of nowhere we tried everything from the reset but to calling costumer service nothing helped horrible product

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing turbo hair dryer
review_body: I bought one for myself.  My mom used it and was amazed.  So I got her one also.  It really makes a difference.  I dye my hair a lot, and this dryer doesn't make my hair look like hay. Edit...looks like it barely lasted 3 years. Seems short to me...I've had dryers last a lot longer.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: For the money you can't beat it. Plus it comes with attachments!! I would definitely buy this if you are looking for a new blow dryer and not interested in spending too much money.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: No side vents, so the top of your head is dry first and becomes unbearably hot, while the sides and back are still wet.  On high, it's very loud.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Best dryer I have ever used
review_body: Best hotel dryer I have ever used ( I travel a lot ), so I purchased one for myself.  Love it!  I have had no problems in the year+ that I've had it.

product_title: conair the power of pink ionic hair dryer
review_headline: Overall its ok - UPDATE - not really
review_body:
It is what it is for a $20 hairdryer. I didn't notice anything better or worse then most hairdryers I have owned except that it does automatically shut off if you use it too long. I guess it overheats? It will pop the circuit and I let it cool a bit and then hit the reset and it works fine again. If you have thick hair that takes a while to dry this would not be the hairdryer for you.

UPDATE: So a few months later and this hairdryer has turned out to be not so great after all. It overheats quickly if it is on high for more than a minute, even though I have cleaned the dust screen, and it shuts off. Very annoying.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: My daughter confiscated my older travel hair dryer so I decided to replace it with this one.  Maybe I should thank her because this dryer is FAR superior to my other one.  Even though it's only 1600W, it puts out a lot of air and my hair dries in no time.  I love the fact that it's a lower wattage as many older hotels throughout Europe can't handle anything higher.  How do I know?  I purchased an 1800W dual voltage one time and managed to blow out half the circuits in an old hotel in Venice.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Gave as a present, but she didn't like it
review_body: I gave it as a Christmas present. It looks pretty nice, but she didn't like it and asked me to exchange it for something else. She liked the look of it, confirmed It is less noisy than normal hair dryers, but simply took longer than normal hair dryer for her long hair.

product_title: conair 1875 watt ionic ceramic folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Not as powerful as expected, but the fact that you can fold it really helps. Not the greatest but okay

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: I used one similiar to this in a hotel and loved it. So I ordered me one. This is a great product and i would reccomend this product !!!!! A+ A+ A+.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body:
I have very long thick hair that is mid-way down my back. My old hair dryer last several years but finally died. I decided on this one because of the reviews and the color (I admit it.)

The color is beautiful. It is the most 'pretty' hair dryer that I have ever owned.

The retractable cord is a must for me. This is an awesome feature that I will not go without. It makes it possible for easier storage and you don't have to worry about the cord getting tangled, ripped, etc.

The heating settings are very standard and work very well.

**The only issue for me is the power (or lack thereof.)
The highest setting has about the same amount of power as the lowest setting on my old hair dryer. (My old dryer had the same amount of watts as this one.) Due to this, it takes much more time to dry my hair than I am used to. However, if you have short hair this iron might be perfect for you.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body:
It is an inexpensive dryer and it does its job with all the functions described. Nothing too fancy. I expect it to last for at least a couple of years.

Update: I just deducted one star because it is too loud, louder than the average.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: This hair dryer is fantastic and quite strong for being so small.  The best part is the dual voltage feature--it works wherever you travel.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: It feels like cheap flimsy plastic to the touch but it' s a pretty decent hair drier for the price. One thing i didn't like is that the concentrator can only be put one one way (like in the pic) because the opening is oval rather than round, i had a feeling it was oval as the picture wasn't too clear. I like holding the hair dryer in a different way but with the concentrator being oval i can not adjust it to my needs.    Update: after using this hair drier for 2 years, one day the handle got super hot and red and burnt smell started coming out of it. I disposed it right away. Not safe! Be careful.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: This ranked second in dryers in my price range; the first was cited as easy to accidentally change the setting. I love this dryer- works fast, strong flow, retractable cord is a plus, hand weight is comfortable.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: This is a nice dryer for the price.  Seems a bit heavy, but it works for me.  Dries my thick hair thoroughly.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: Best hair dryer I have owned
review_body: Have had this for a little over a year now.  It is extremely lightweight and feels very good quality.  Plenty of different settings and all of them work well.  Good airflow and it is plenty hot or cool enough.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Hair Dryer Broke After Two Months
review_body: Initially I really liked this hair dryer.  It worked well and ran quietly, but it suddenly stopped working.  While it worked fine yesterday, when I plugged it in this morning it just wouldn't turn on.  Because I've owned it less than two months, I've requested a replacement through Amazon to give it another a try.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Conair Ion Shine 1875-Watt Hair Dryer- Blue
review_body: This hairdryer was a really good buy, and my daughter really loved having her own without having to borrow mom's hairdryer every day! It is a nice hairdryer.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body:
Christmas Present for my wife.
I now know more about Hair dryers than I ever hoped to know, but she loves it and that is all that matters. She says it is the best she has ever owned.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This hairdryer works well for the price. I would buy it again. Hair dries fairly quickly, but the air stream is not that strong.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: So wonderful! it comes with both attachments!
review_body: I mention that comes with both attachments in the subject because I was confused when I first bought it I thought it came just with the concentrator not with the diffusor but what was my surprise when I opened the box it came with both which are wonderful! I have curly hair and it worked perfectly on me

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body:
The product Worked well
I Would recommend
I Would buy again
Arrived on time as stated online
Very Cost effective

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_body: You can't get excited over a hair dryer. It works , it dries and thats all it has to do.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I got this hair dryer for Christmas, and I love it! The retractable cord is perfect for the limited space of my bathroom, The attachments work really well and my hair dries quickly. The only "iffy" thing about it is it doesn't seem to get as hot as my old dryer, but this may actually be better for my hair.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: I love love love this hair dryer. I have had it for quite a while, and it has been amazing. Great for blowing my hair straight, never burns, and dries very quickly.

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body: I bought this product after reading about it in a magazine.  I love it.  It drys my hair very quickly and without frizz!

product_title: elevate by andis 80405 professional lightweight tourmaline ceramic ionic 1875 watts hair dryer
review_body: product received in good time and we liked it because it was requested by me to give away and use

product_title: hot tools ionic anti-static professional dryer - model # 1035 - black/purple hair dryer for unisex
review_headline: Not as great as I was expecting
review_body: I bought this because I was looking for a faster drying, and more quiet hair dryer.  My husband always complains about me blow drying my hair in the mornings before he gets up. In all honesty, I can't tell the difference between this one, and my previous $10 Revlon one from Walmart. It takes the same amount of time to dry my hair, and to me, it doesn't seem any quieter.  I do like the IDEA of the Ions leaving your hair less staticy and healthier, but I don't know that I can really tell the difference. My husband hasn't been complaining about the noise as much, but I don't know if its because he knows I bought a new hair dryer trying to please him, or if it's actually a lower frequency. To me, with it up close to my head, I can't tell a difference.

product_title: conair 1875-watt ionic conditioning pro style hair dryer
review_body: Pretty nice dryer for such a low price. The device works fine for me. And it has many features such as the interruption key for temporally disable the heater and blowing cold air.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer is the best! Its is light weight and it leaves your hair looking beautiful. It has 2 temperatures and 2 speeds whisch really comes in handy, but it has a very short cord which may interfere with your styling ability. For the price it is great :)

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Great little hair dryer that gives you what you need without being too huge or expensive.  Great for small spaces, after gym, people that MUST travel with a dryer, and I imagine, people with easy to manage hair.  This is definitely a no-frills, standard, and simple dryer.  If you're looking for low maintenance, low budget, easy, this is it!

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I am a retired hairdresser ,for years I have found that Revlon blow dryers just keep going, this one is strong enough to get thick hair the heat is needs for a great blow out.I have my pro blow dryer but with tweenagers always around, having this for them to use at the house is great and nice to have in the guest bath. Very happy with the quality and durabilty.

product_title: sunbeam hd3004-005 tourmaline 1875 watt folding hair dryer with retractable cord
review_body: Works well and I don't feel like I'm damaging my hearing when using it.  Shipped quickly.  Stores well and electrical cord recoil is cool.

product_title: conair thermal shine 1875 watt hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Great product! I bought one for a gift and one for myself! Easy to use, doesn't get to hot, and lightweight!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I bought this hair dryer a few months ago to replace my old one (a different brand). This new hair dryer is as powerful as my last one (which I loved), but much quieter and my hair does not feel frizzy afterwards. My only complaint is that the handle is peeling a little at the bottom.

product_title: turbo power turbo 1500 professional hair dryer
review_headline: Takes forever to dry my hair
review_body: I would return this but it's been too long. I almost immediately went back to my old dryer after a couple of times. I have since found another dryer on Amazon that I just received and it's doing a wonderful job.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Great product at a great price. Provides just the right temperature, and dries very well. Have had no issues with it since purchase. Highly recommended.

product_title: t3 bespoke labs 83808-se featherweight professional ionic ceramic tourmaline hair dryer
review_body: This is one of the best hair dryers I have ever used.  It is very quiet and light.  Since it's an Ionic it leave your hair smooth and shiny.  It's a full size hairdryer but travels very well since it's so lightweight.  I would highly recommened it..

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Good hair dryer and not over priced
review_body: I have used this for a couple of weeks now and am very pleased with this hair dryer.  It was not overly expensive and works very well, quickly drying the hair.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: This was a Christmas gift and was what my daughter asked for. It meets her expectations and was just what she wanted.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I am picky about hairdryers because they always make a very loud sound but I feel like the power and force just isn't there. This Conair I have been very happy with.It is strong and take an adequate time to dry my hair. If this ever dies, I will buy this same dryer again.

product_title: andis hangup 1600w hair dryer with cord hanger
review_headline: Hair Dryer that stores nicely away but easily accessable
review_body: Have used it for over two months now and love it.  Easy to install and the cord stays neat on the hook.  Powerful enough to dry my short and in less than 3 minutes. My main reason for purchasing this was to find something I could hang-on the wall for easy access to use daily and to have it stored nicely in our main bathroom when not in use.

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: I did not purchase this on Amazon..I purchased from a local Sally's after my Gold N Hot (see my review) died a few weeks after purchase.  The attachment to this one seals really well and it dries like a pro!  True tourmaline technology..though most dryers say the hair will dry silky and without frizz..this one ACTUALLY does the trick.  Most other brands do not.  My hair was so straight I really could have just curled it instead of flat ironing.  Really Really nice dryer.  Great replacement for the junk I thought was a good product.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: It's a hairdrier and it works. The true test is how long it will last... and unfortunately, I won't likely come back and review it in a few years.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: i'm in love with my blow dryer
review_body: i love this blow dryer. it's so quiet and it does an outstanding job. :) my friend had lended me hers and i loved it so i went out and purchase one of my own.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: We use this dryer when we in Europe.  It is small and packs well, and works like a dryer should.  Nothing negative to say, but it is just a travel dryer, and 5 stars seemed a bit much.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: After using this blow dryer at a Renaissance Hotel, I was surprised at how soft it made my hair feel with absolutely no frizz.  Another plus, it also dried my medium-textured straight hair very quickly.  The retractable cord is very convenient as well as its ability to fold.  The included concentrator does a great job of drying your roots fast.  I loved this blow dryer so much, I bought my daughter one for her college dorm, and she loves it too.  Thank you Andis!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: excellent job very satisfied. not too much more to say no problems worked out okie dokie smoky a okay .

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I have naturally curly hair and this hairdryer plus the diffuser have really brought out my curls! I love it! I use the setting below the high setting and then put it on cooler air as I am finishing up. I leave it a little bit damp. My hair is never frizzy with this hairdryer. The only thing I don't like about this hair dryer is the cord. It is not very long. I would recommend this hair dryer, especially if you have curly hair and like the use the diffuser. The price is not bad as it does include 2 attachments (the diffuser and another one to localize the airflow). I would purchase this again, but another 18 inches of cord would be nice.

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_body: I was disappointed with this product. It states it dries your hair 70% faster, but I don't find this to be true. Also the switches are in a very awkward place and I often turn them off by accident while using the dryer.

product_title: turbo power turbo 1500 professional hair dryer
review_body: All I can say about this hair dryer is that my wife loves it. I purchased the very same one around 5 years ago. Well, it finally died, but since it was so good, I purchased another one for my wife. She says that it works faster than others she had before, that is comfortable to hold and obviously it last for a very long time. She highly recommend it!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Great hair dryer, worth every penny
review_body: Powerful! A little heavy, but not bad. I can dry my hair in 10 mins, 15 if I want it to look nice. Definitely a great tool.

product_title: conair 1875-watt ionic conditioning pro style hair dryer
review_body:
I bought this as a gift for myself. I was a wee bit disappointed, as it didn't live-up to the quietness of my past ionic dryer. It 'blows' hard and is quite noisy relative to it - even on the low blower setting.

However, the hand set is comfortable and it does the job with lots of blowing noise.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Very handy for the grooming kit, you can wash up and dry your hair quickly without having to wait long for hair to dry

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body: I bought this hair dryer because my old one stopped working.  This seems like a good quality buy, certainly for the price, but no professional dryer.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body:
My wife used one of these at a motel we stayed in. She really wanted one so I bought it. Your old lady will dig it too because it is powerful and has a cord reel. You will hate yourself later when you have to disassemble it to dig her hair out of it because she complains about it not blowing hard like it used to. But women are like that.........blah blah blah complain blah blah.....
If you can disassemble this thing, clean it and re-assemble it in working order before she needs it to dry her wet head consider yourself lucky. I think a nuclear bomb would be easier to work on.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I have been using the Andis Ionic Ceramic Hair dryer for years.  My first one (1600W) gave up the ghost several years ago so I replaced it with their newest model (1875W) at that time. Seeing I have had good performance with this dryer I decided to buy a back-up.

product_title: jerdon wall mount hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: I have had 2 of these for a couple of years. The one that is used by 3 people daily finally went. Bought again because its convenient and has decent power. Added a third one to my daughters room to free up the bathroom.

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer was recommended to me by a hair stylist at the salon I use. It works beautifully. A little heavier than my former Conair (which lasted 10 years). My diffuser fits on it. Has a cleanable compartment for lint.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body:
The hair brush and combs fall off when you use them.The hairdryer specification say it three speed but fails to mention it only works on one speed and one heat setting if used at the 240 voltage!!!!!
I feel that the seller fails to mention the limitations... who buys a one speed one heat hair dryer?

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: My sister-in-law asked for this hairdryer for Christmas. Very handy for all the travel she does. She is very happy with it.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Worked great while it lasted, good for travel
review_body: This hair dryer worked great while it lasted.  Only buy it if you are looking for one that collapses and has a retractable cord for travel.  Otherwise, you are much better off getting something else

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer is small and easy to handle, but the best thing is the air flow. Many hair dryers use the word turbo in their description, but this one truly has turbo air flow. It dries my hair quickly and leaves it shining.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Works as it should.  Have dropped it on hard wood floor a few times and it has still worked well and no chipped plastic.

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_body: This dryer is not featherweight like it says in the name.  It weighs about the same as the one I was already using.  My hair does not dry any faster and is not made any smoother than it was with my old dryer.  It's not bad, just ordinary.

product_title: t3 tourmaline 83808 professional featherweight ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_headline: T3 Tourmaline 83808 Professional Featherweight Ceramic Ionic Hair
review_body: I Love it!!!! I use it everyday. One of the best blow dryers I have purchased. My hairstyles uses it on her clients.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I have used it a few times and it works very well for the price. The cord could be a little longer however.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: This works great and does the job I need it to do.  I'm giving it four stars instead of five because of the storage issue.  I don't like having to cram the cord and extention to the hood back inside the case each time.  I would prefer a slightly larger case that would accomodate everything more easily.

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body: Bought this hairdryer based on great reviews and so far it's been great. Lightweight and comes with a couple attachments for extra shine or curly hair. Get's the job done.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: This hair dryer works great. It has lots of power and dries super fast. A little more bulky than other travel hair dryers but since the cord retracts into the handle, it still fits in my carry bag.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: This hairdryer is way too bulky,big, heavy. Makes so much noise that it almost sound like airplane propeller. This is going back.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I haven't had a dryer with attachments since high school, but this thing is a life saver! I don't have to straighten my hair when I use the small tooth comb and it dries my hair very fast. So much of my time has been saved since I got this wonderful gadget.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: Great product exactly how it is described. You can't beat a Revlon blow dryer. It's also very affordable and compact.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Drys quickly, not overly noisy, switches are conveniently placed (where they're not accidentally moved on/off)  The air filter can be removed for cleaning.  I use all three temperature settings, both fan speeds, and the cool-shot button.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: I love my Vidal Sassoon VS547 Hair Dryer!
review_body: I have had the same Vidal Sassoon dryer for years.  Someone big stepped on the plug which made it unsafe to use.  I love this dryer, it's exactly what I've been using! I'm totally satisfied with the purchase....thanks for the quick delivery!

product_title: t3 bespoke featherweight tourmaline professional ionic ceramic hair dryer model 83808-se
review_body: I have owned this dryer previously and was looking to acquire a replacement but had wanted to shop this out sinceit is pricey for a hair dryer.  Phenomenal price and even better delivery time.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: I was looking for a smaller unit than this and stil I am.; the one I got is still to bulky to go in my bags.

product_title: mangroomer 1680xl-6 professional ionic hair dryer for men
review_body: THIS DRYER IS EXTREMELY HIGH POWERED. IT IS SOMEWHAT HEAVY, BUT I LOVE THE GRIP OF IT AND ITS PROBABLY SLIGHTLY HEAVY BECAUSE IT REALLY IS HIGH POWERED AND FAST DRYING

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: Bueno llego en perfecto estado y funciona muy bien ,es de buena potencia y el indicado  para relizar la el secado

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_body:
I bought this after reviewing every review of every hairdryer online to replace a Sharper Image hairdryer that had literally split at the seam.

I got mine $20 cheaper on sale at Folica.com with a 2 year warranty.--On their site they rate it as the best hair dryer of 2012.

The dryer itself is smaller than the online video reviews make it seem (youtube) and is nearly the same size as my previous travel size dryer.
It comes with 2 diffuser heads and a case. It seems very sturdy and yes, it has dried my hair in half the time of my previous ionic dryer.

Note that the ionic setting emits less heat so if you need to style your hair you'll need to switch to the other position for more heat.

I have round, straight hair, fine but thick and this dryer takes less than 5 minutes to fully dry vs. my other hair dryer I would dry for 5 minutes and walk out the door with wet hair.

Also, worth noting that since my last haircut I hadn't been able to get it to look as good as when I walked out of the salon until I used this hair dryer! So now I'm convinced it's all about the hairdryer, forget everything else. Totally worth your money.

If I hadn't already purchased this hairdryer I might have gone for the Solano since my hairdresser recommended that one (he also reminded me that the department store/box store dryers are not the same quality ionic dryers and you need at least 1875 watts...) but this one is nearly half the weight of the Solano and pretty darn great.

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_headline: This hairdryer started sparking and burned my arm
review_body: I bought my hair dryer about 6 months ago.  I wasn't overly impressed with it.  It never seemed to get as hot as my previous T3 dryer and didn't smooth my hair like before.  The topper came yesterday when the dryer started sparking as I was using it leaving a nice burn on my arm.  I thought $90 for this dryer was a deal compared to stores but truth is the dryer isn't worth $9!!  Either T3 is making really cheap products or this is a knock off.  Buyer beware!!

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: Nightlight is very bright! Beware if bathroom is off the bedroom, you may need to cover it to tone it down. Otherwise, the hairdryer is excellent - nice to be able to set power for either 1200 or 1600 watts (recessed switch, takes a tool). Then you have high/low finger switch.

product_title: hot tools 1059 tourmaline ionic standing hair dryer hood rolling salon wheels
review_body: My hairdresser comes to my house and this is absolutely perfect for home use.  The temperature is just right and the hood is comfortable.

product_title: hot tools ionic anti-static professional dryer - model # 1035 - black/purple hair dryer for unisex
review_body: We ordered this as a Christmas gift on the recommendation of our stylist.  She spoke highly of the product and manufacturer.  However, upon opening, the dryer did not work on the High setting.  We will need to return it.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: I had it for a while and I haven't had any problems with it.  What more is there to say?

product_title: turbo power turbo 1500 professional hair dryer
review_body: It let my hair so nice and without freeze!!!!! im so sad that i drop mine by mistake after 3 years that i have it with me, but ill defenetly buy it again!!!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Speedy shipment, easy ordering, sent just as described, awesome product. My teen aged daughter is loving this hair styler! Thanks!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Took years for me to buy a new hairdryer and I will never wait again to do so.  This hairdryer has power, works great, on the quieter side of blow dryers and really does the job!

product_title: extracompact twinturbo 3500 2000 watt compact professional hair dryer
review_body: I'm a professional hairstylist and have purchased this dryer two times. My old one broke but I use it every day all day and had it for two years. The new one seems improved from last time with a better sturdier power chord. It's super powerful and light and heats up to the perfect temp hot but not overly hot. Overall I love it and it makes my job easier!

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: Throughout extensive travels, I would find this model in better hotels & resorts and decided to get one for myself.  Really good, easy to control and direct to exact spots for drying and styling.  Doesn't have a "Cool shot" button, but I really don't miss it.

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_body: I bought this for my mum and myself for Christmas... Didn't even last until the New Year and broke after two lousy uses. Biggest waste of $250 I've ever spent

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Nice product with a lot of power.  I love how the cord reels up inside of the dryer for storage.  Great buy.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body:
I'm a little disappointed, Andis.

I bought this dryer for trips, and it does what it needs to do - it folds up, it dries my hair. But it's rather loud, and the cord isn't entirely retractable, and it's frankly a little underpowered - it's slow. Is it fine for trips? Yes. But I've used much better, stronger dryers that cost far less. Be aware: You're paying for the label, not the performance. ("Ceramic" - oh lord, that is truly up there with "ionic" in the pantheon of absurd "just paint it on there and add another zero to the price" labels!) I don't hate it, but I wouldn't buy it again.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710

review_headline: Cheap hair dryer with no power
review_body:
This hair dryer was a waste of money.

The cord is far too short for proper styling unless you are standing within 2 feet of power socket.

The warm setting is cool

On the hot setting Only the inner part of the dryer blows hot hair and the outer rim is cool air which makes the hot setting basically a warm.

Very disappointed- I would pay 15-20 for this as my local CVS.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body:
Wow, it is huge ... and not just huge for a "portable" ... I mean huge. Now maybe it's because this baby is an 1875 watt job and all our other current and prior hair dryers are 1600 or less. When it is open, it is bigger than any other hair dryer we have ever owned. When it is closed (folded, for "travel" -- heh, like this would handily fit in a suitcase) this thing is almost as big as my dopp (shaving bag). Fortunately we travel more by ground so we don't worry much about suitcase space.

And, as others have mentioned, the cord does not reel in all the way without help or retries. We can live with that. Even once the cord is stored, the cordstop leaves about a foot of cord out. It wasn't a surprise because other reviewers have mentioned this too.

On the plus side it does dry hair quickly. FYI, all the girls in our family have long thick hair.

A very important feature this dryer has -- and a major reason I chose it -- is that it does have a "medium" heat setting. (Most just have high and low, with low being very low.) The reason "medium" is important, especially on a high wattage unit, is that "high" can blow circuit breakers. If you don't whether you have 20amp service on an outlet, you may really want the medium setting. (Ever try to get a hotel to reset your breaker while your wife's hair is wet?) The "medium" setting dries hair just fine. The high setting dries hair scary fast, but I'm not sure how good that much heat is for your hair in the long run, but it is nice to have when you're in a hurry.

A word of advice about any high wattage appliance with a cord reel: always pull the cord all the way out regardless of how much you need. I don't know if it tells you that in the manual but it's always a good idea because a coiled cord carrying a lot of current will get hot. From staring at this unit, it is possible the hair dryer draws the cold intake air across the cord reel so they might have thought of that already but I wouldn't rely on that.

Anyway, this is a great hair dryer as long as you know before buying about its size and the price is certainly right.the cord reel so they might have thought of that already but I wouldn't rely on that.

Anyway, this is a great hair dryer as long as you know before buying about its size and the price is certainly right.

product_title: conair bb075w pro blackbird 2000-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Thought it was going to be more powerful...
review_body:
I had a Conair YellowBird Pro which is an awesome dryer. I had it for so many years the styling pick had developed a crack. Thought I would upgrade, and this BlackBird seemed like a good choice.

It's not a bad dryer. I'm thankful it is 2000 Watts. But, it doesn't seem to move the air as strong as my YellowBird does. It seems a little underpowered, I'm still going to search for perhaps a 2200 Watt dryer, if I can find one. I want a dryer that has more power, not necessarily more heat.

Heat settings are good- the highest heat is quite hot. I use the second-highest setting. It's nice to also have a no-heat setting. But the no-heat only works on low power, with is useless. Next time, I'll make sure that I get the Conair that has the Cool-shot button that cuts the heat while keeping the speed high.

Not a bad dryer- does the job, and certainly better that the 1875 Watt piece of junk you get at the drugstore. Consider a different model if airspeed is important to you.

review_body: Chose this dryer because of the good reviews. Has a few annoying features: double buttons (heat and speed) and hard not move both when one only needs to move one. Also not that strong and so doesn't dry very quickly. Finally, sometimes the concentrator falls off. However, it was not expenssive so you get what you pay for.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I bought this because it was cute and other 1875 watt dryers seemed to do the trick before. This is just awful if you have thick hair. It is very weak and I can hear things popping inside.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_headline: Revlon RV408 1875 Watt Full-size Trubo Dryer, Black
review_body: It 's a nice dryer.  It works well.  I don't really use any of the special features, although it has the 3 heat settings and 1 cooling setting.  I just dry my hair.

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: It works as I desired, without blowing my hair with a blast.  It is a gentle air for fine hair.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: The item was packaged well but we were missing the diffuser for some reason not sure what happened but package was received very quickly.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: my wife loves it and the night light is very nice.  she uses it every day and finds it really works good

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body: It works fast, quietly and better than much higher priced hair dryers. I love the shine it leaves with minimal effort and time.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: I really love this hair dryer. My hair always looks nice and smooth and silky after using it and it dries my thick hair really fast.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: My hair has come out fantastic every time with this. The attachments are great. The only thing is that the attachments are hard to get on...but it works. Love it and highly recommend.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: I had the same hair dryer for about six years, then it gave up.  I really didn't want to have to find another kind and change the mounting bracket, etc.  So I ordered the same model number and the bracket was still the same!  Yeah!  I was able to change it out myself!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I have long wavy hair and I bought this because it came with a diffuser attachment. It clicks in no problem (as well as the concentrator but I've only used it once) and you can easily take it off. The cord is longer so if you have a larger bathroom, it helps. It also has a hook on the base of the handle, you can kind of see it in the picture, which helps with storage if you choose to hang it up. I use it on the hot heat, low setting and I don't see a lot of frizz even without product. It dries my hair quickly without it being noisy. But if you use it on the high setting, it gets noisy. Overall, I love this dryer. So far. I'll post another review if anything bad happens to the dryer.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: Everytime i take it of by bag at the gym, girls start laughing, but when they see me using it and the results, they ask me where i got it...I very proud of my purchase! :D

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I bought this product in order to use it when I moved, I tried it and it seems pretty good.

product_title: extracompact twinturbo 3500 2000 watt compact professional hair dryer
review_body: Such a great tool! It makes hair drying much faster, and my hair never stays curly. It drys almost all straight.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_headline: Compact dryer works well for fine hair
review_body: If you are looking for a lightweight dryer that doesn't create hurricane force winds this is the one. My hair is short/medium length and fine. I don't need a mega dryer that sound like an aircraft. This is a compact little thing that fits the bill. It is also a tad quieter than the typical 1875 watt dryer. Two settings high(hot) and low (warm)work great for creating a curl/wave with a round brush. Would recommend for short to medium length fine hair.

product_title: babyliss pro one 'n only argan heat ceramic hair dryer, 1875 watt
review_headline: Best hair dryer. I love it!
review_body:
I have very frizzy hair, but after i wash my hair and use this to dry it up it makes my hair soft and smooth.
I would recommend this dryer to my friends.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body:
I was looking for an affordable hair dryer and picked this one based on other reviews, and its worked great for me.
You can change the settings enough to get any kind of speed or temperature, and since you can fold the handle it's easy to store in a small bathroom drawer.
The retractable cord is a plus too, and it doesn't get all tangled up with your other junk. No complaints!

product_title: jerdon wall mount hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: The only thing I don't like about it is the dryer cord plugs into the wall.  My last wall mounted dryer had a separate power cord from the wall mount.  Just note this if your mounting the dryer and your electrical outlet isn't close by.  Otherwise, I would recommend this product.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Really nice  Hair dryer. Is for a gift and I'm sure she will love it. I like the way the handle folds.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: ship very fast,stuff is good!~I like it!~good styff ,I love it ,very nice good !~good good good !~very good !

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: I purchased this hair dryer after watching a series of blow drying tutorials. I researched a lot about hair dryers since this was my first purchase. I wanted to invest in a decent blow dryer which would last me for atleast an year. I have wavy hair and I have recently got a layer cut done with a scoop. I understood the need of a good blow dryer to get that wow look that you get after a salon visit. I must say the elchim professional 2001 truly met all my expectations. The dryer is quite light and easily manageable by blow dry virgins. If you are planning to buy a blow dryer for the first time, then i would suggest you to go for this one. This 2000 Watt dryer is very powerful and straightens your hair instantly. All you need a Ceramic Jumbo round brush ( from Brush lab) and this powerful device to create the look you have always craved for. I am really happy with the results.My husband always admires my hair now and I simply can't stop blushing...:) I  wanted a red and black combi dryer, but they sent me a black one instead. Thats Ok. When this breaks, I'm gonna simply make another purchase of the same product.

product_title: t3 bespoke labs 83808-se featherweight professional ionic ceramic tourmaline hair dryer
review_body:
I bought my first T3 for the weight, noise, and ionic benefits. I had a T3 for years and loved the performance. However the construction was shabby from day one. The nozzle would not stay in place. I ended up taping it on. When it finally died, I replaced it with another T3 thinking the first one was a lemon. This last one also disappointed. The first time I tried to replace the concentrator, it bent the dryer!

Plus this one seemed to leave my hair fuzzy - NO benefits from ionic ceramic claims. This one is in a drawer and I use the Revlon I bought for 1/3 the price.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Very good dryer for the price. I like the high speed without having to use high heat. Retractable cord is great.

product_title: hot tools ionic anti-static professional dryer - model # 1035 - black/purple hair dryer for unisex
review_body:
Upon first use, this item did not blow hot air. On the low flow airflow setting, it blew vaguely warm. On the high airflow setting, it blew cold.

When set to low heat, it didn't even pretend.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: Had a good experience with this order, it took about 7 business days to arrive.  And have been using this product for years.

product_title: conair ionic conditioning 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer w/ retractable cord and folding handle
review_body: Great hair dryer . Wife loves the retractable cord and compact size. After using the hair dryer for about a year, the cord broke inside causing the dryer to shut on and off.  The warranty is about useless because after paying all the shipping costs both ways, it costs as much as buying a new one.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: I don't usually write a review but...
review_body: Had this item for a year now and it just broke on me, so I figured I needed to write a review to warn buyers. When the item first arrived, the back lid (air vent) didn't close all the way but it really didn't bother me much. I've had many other 1875w dryers and this one was a bit louder than my previous ones. About a week ago, the hair dryer stopped producing warm/hot air and now it just blows cold air. Had to throw it out and purchase a different hair dryer. This might just be a one time scenario... but I wouldn't purchase again.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: For the price, this is a pretty nice dryer. I almost never use the low setting on hair dryers regardless, but I tested it just to see, and it's not quite hot enough to give me the oomph I need to dry my hair. So there's that. The cold shot seems to suck up a lot of power, and I don't use it any more for fear of blowing a circuit breaker, but considering how much I paid for it, this does its job and it does it pretty well.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: My wife has an abundant, curly head of hair, and when her dryer took its last breath, I looked for a replacement with both ionic and heat sink (ceramic) qualities to efficiently dry her hair without damaging it.  Because of size and weight, it's not well-suited for travel, and the retractable cord does not fully retract, but from reviews I've read, this type of mechanism is problematic more often than not - you just live with the fickle function when you choose a model with both a retractable cord and a folding handle.  That said, pumpkin seems content with her new dryer.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: Shipped fast. This dryer dries my thick long hair quite a bit qucker than the dryer it replaced. I also really like that the cord is extra long.  I don't plan to use the attachmens so I cannot comment on those.

product_title: proversa micro turbo dual voltage portable hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: Not a bad little hair dryer. Seems to work well. If I had any criticism it would be when using the low heat setting, it's a bit windier than I would ideally want, and the handle is a little fatter than it needs to be. But all in all, a nice dryer.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I expected more from this hair dryer after reading the reviews.  It wasn't as powerful as I like and the opening for the air coming out seems to be larger than my last dryer, so it just goes all over the place instead of being more focused.  The thing I'm most unhappy with is the cord.  I always buy dryers that have the retractable cord because I can't stand having to deal with the cord getting wrapped around everything in my drawer.  Every other dryer that I've had the cord goes all the way into the dryer just leaving the plug hanging out.  This dryer has about a foot or more of cord still hanging.  It is just a pain deal with the dangling cord while putting it in and out of the drawer every day.  I'm still deciding if I should return it or not.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I like this drying in many ways. It is lightweight, it is powerful, has a great retractable cord and that is a huge plus! I hope it lasts a long time.

product_title: jerdon wall mount hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: Easy to use, very handy, always at your disposal.  It isn't a powerful dryer, but it works great on mens hair.  The wall mount is simple to install, and it's shock protected.  Great value

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: Bright nightlight, light weight, excellent heat and air for such a compact hair dryer.  A must have, space saver and reasonable price.

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
